Linear Kernel

Class

kerch.kernel.Linear

alias of <module ‘kerch.kernel.Linear’ from ‘/volume1/scratch/hdeplaen/Kerch/kerch/kernel/Linear.py’>

Examples

Sine

import kerch
import numpy as np
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt

x = np.sin(np.arange(50) / np.pi) + 1.5
plt.figure(0)
plt.plot(x)

k = kerch.kernel.Linear(sample=x)
plt.figure(1)
plt.imshow(k.K)
plt.colorbar()

(Source code)
